item.title: Tyflow Experiments
item.description: Experiments with 3D Physics and Particle Simulations I’d used 3DS Max professionally every day for a couple of years, but still barely scratched the surface of what it could do. These experiments with Tyflow are by-products of deepening my technical and artistic skills, by learning more about 3D particle systems, physics simulations, and animation. I enrolled in the Tyflow Basecamp in 2020 and thoroughly enjoyed learning and making these.
